Title: Bloodlines
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Evan Dunsky
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Lucas questions an Amish teacher who is known to be violent and somewhat radical. Chayton attempts an escape while being transported. Proctor uses his special brand of magic to find his nephew. Nola delivers final justice for Lana Cleary.
